verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David רִיבָ֣ה <S%H7378><s%> ri-Vah Plead יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [my cause] O LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרִיבַ֑י <S%H3401><s%> ye-ri-Vai; with them that strive לְ֝חַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> le-Cham, with me fight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ <S%H3898><s%> Lo-cha-Mai. against them that fight

הַחֲזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> ha-cha-Zek Take hold מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen of shield וְצִנָּ֑ה <S%H6793><s%> ve-tzin-Nah; and buckler וְ֝ק֗וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> ve-Ku-mah, and stand up בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H5833><s%> be-'ez-ra-Ti. for mine help

וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק <S%H7324><s%> ve-Ha-Rek Draw out חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> cha-Nit also the spear וּ֭סְגֹר <S%H5462><s%> U-se-gor and stop לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> lik-Rat [the way] against רֹדְפָ֑י <S%H7291><s%> ro-de-Fai; them that persecute אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor me say לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi, unto my soul יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Tech I [am] thy salvation אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni. I

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Let them be confounded וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ <S%H3637><s%> ve-yik-kal-Mu and put to shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> yis-So-gu let them be turned אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> a-Chor back וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ <S%H2659><s%> ve-yach-pe-Ru; and brought to confusion חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י <S%H2803><s%> cho-she-Vei, that devise רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Ti. my hurt

יִֽהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu, them be like כְּמֹ֥ץ <S%H4671><s%> ke-Motz Let them be as chaff לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei- before ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach; the wind וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> u-mal-'Ach and let the angel יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD דּוֹחֶֽה׃ <S%H1760><s%> do-Cheh. chase

יְֽהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- Let דַרְכָּ֗ם <S%H1870><s%> dar-Kam, Let their way חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech be dark וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת <S%H2519><s%> va-cha-lak-lak-Kot; and slippery וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> u-mal-'Ach and let the angel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD רֹדְפָֽם׃ <S%H7291><s%> ro-de-Fam. persecute

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For חִנָּ֣ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam For without cause טָֽמְנוּ־ <S%H2934><s%> ta-me-nu- have they hid לִ֭י li שַׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> Sha-chat [in] a pit רִשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H7568><s%> rish-Tam; for me their net חִ֝נָּ֗ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam, [which] without cause חָפְר֥וּ <S%H2658><s%> cha-fe-Ru they have digged לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> te-vo-'E-hu come שׁוֹאָה֮ <S%H7722><s%> sho-'Ah Let destruction לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יֵ֫דָ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ye-Da' acknowledge וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H7568><s%> ve-rish-To and let his net אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which טָמַ֣ן <S%H2934><s%> ta-Man that he hath hid תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ <S%H3920><s%> til-ke-Do; catch בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה <S%H7722><s%> be-sho-'Ah, himself into that very destruction יִפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pol- let him fall בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Ve-naf-shi And my soul תָּגִ֣יל <S%H1523><s%> ta-Gil shall be joyful בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD תָּ֝שִׂישׂ <S%H7797><s%> Ta-sis it shall rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'a-To. in his salvation

כָּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> kal All עַצְמוֹתַ֨י׀ <S%H6106><s%> atz-mo-Tai All my bones תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ <S%H559><s%> to-mar-Nah shall say יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi who כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-cha is like מַצִּ֣יל <S%H5337><s%> matz-Tzil who [is] like unto thee which deliverest עָ֭נִי <S%H6041><s%> 'A-ni the poor מֵחָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> me-cha-Zak from him that is too strong מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; is too וְעָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> ve-'a-Ni for him yea the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon, and the needy מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1497><s%> mig-go-ze-Lo. from him that spoileth

יְ֭קוּמוּן <S%H6965><s%> Ye-ku-mun did rise up עֵדֵ֣י <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dei witnesses חָמָ֑ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas; FALSE אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, [things] that I knew יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ <S%H7592><s%> yish-'a-Lu-ni. they laid to my charge

יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-le-Mu-ni They rewarded רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> Ra-'ah me evil תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash טוֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah, for good שְׁכ֣וֹל <S%H7908><s%> she-Chol [to] the spoiling לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi. of my soul

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni Me בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם <S%H2470><s%> ba-cha-lo-Tam But as for me when they were sick לְב֬וּשִׁי <S%H3830><s%> le-Vu-shi my clothing שָׂ֗ק <S%H8242><s%> Sak, [was] sackcloth עִנֵּ֣יתִי <S%H6031><s%> 'in-Nei-ti I humbled בַצּ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> vatz-Tzom with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> u-te-fil-la-Ti, and my prayer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto חֵיקִ֥י <S%H2436><s%> chei-Ki into mine own bosom תָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv. returned

כְּרֵֽעַ־ <S%H7453><s%> ke-re-a'- myself as though [he had been] my friend כְּאָ֣ח <S%H251><s%> ke-'Ach [or] brother לִ֭י li הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-La-che-ti; I behaved כַּאֲבֶל־ <S%H57><s%> ka-'a-vel- as one that mourneth אֵ֝֗ם <S%H517><s%> 'Em, [for his] mother קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> ko-Der heavily שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ <S%H7817><s%> sha-Cho-ti. I bowed down

וּבְצַלְעִי֮ <S%H6761><s%> u-ve-tzal-'I But in mine adversity שָׂמְח֪וּ <S%H8055><s%> sa-me-Chu they rejoiced וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ <S%H622><s%> ve-ne-'E-Sa-fu and gathered themselves together נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ <S%H622><s%> ne-'es-Fu gathered themselves together עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against נֵ֭כִים <S%H5222><s%> Ne-chim [yea] the abjects וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo without יָדַ֑עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti; against me and I knew קָֽרְע֥וּ <S%H7167><s%> ka-re-'U [it] not they did tear וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- without דָֽמּוּ׃ <S%H1826><s%> Dam-mu. [me] and ceased

בְּ֭חַנְפֵי <S%H2611><s%> Be-chan-fei With hypocritical לַעֲגֵ֣י <S%H3934><s%> la-'a-Gei mockers מָע֑וֹג <S%H4580><s%> ma-'og; in feasts חָרֹ֖ק <S%H2786><s%> cha-Rok they gnashed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai with שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ <S%H8127><s%> shin-Nei-mov. upon me with their teeth

אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord כַּמָּ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> kam-Mah how תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh how long wilt thou look on הָשִׁ֣יבָה <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shi-vah ;rescue נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi my soul מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7722><s%> mish-sho-'ei-Hem; from their destructions מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים <S%H3715><s%> mik-ke-fi-Rim, from the lions יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H3173><s%> ye-chi-da-Ti. my darling

א֭וֹדְךָ <S%H3034><s%> od-cha I will give thee thanks בְּקָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> be-ka-Hal congregation רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav; in the great בְּעַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> be-'Am people עָצ֣וּם <S%H6099><s%> 'a-Tzum thee among much אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> 'a-Hal-Le-ka. I will praise אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-chu- cheer up

לִ֣י li אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai Let not them that are mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker; wrongfully שֹׂנְאַ֥י <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ai that hate חִ֝נָּ֗ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam, me without a cause יִקְרְצוּ־ <S%H7169><s%> yik-re-tzu- over me [neither] let them wink עָֽיִן׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'A-yin. with the eye

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, not peace יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-Dab-Be-ru For they speak וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al against רִגְעֵי־ <S%H7282><s%> rig-'ei- against [them that are] quiet אֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz; in the land דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei matters מִ֝רְמוֹת <S%H4820><s%> Mir-mot deceitful יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ <S%H2803><s%> ya-cha-sho-Vun. but they devise

וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <S%H7337><s%> vai-yar-Chi-vu wide עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, against פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H6310><s%> pi-Hem Yea they opened their mouth אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> 'A-me-ru against me [and] said הֶאָ֣ח׀ <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach Aha הֶאָ֑ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach; aha רָאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'a-Tah hath seen עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-nu. our eye

רָאִ֣יתָה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-tah [This] thou hast seen יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ <S%H2790><s%> te-che-Rash; keep not silence אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, O Lord אֲל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> tir-Chak be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. at

הָעִ֣ירָה <S%H5782><s%> ha-'I-rah Stir up וְ֭הָקִיצָה <S%H6974><s%> Ve-ha-ki-tzah thyself and awake לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <S%H4941><s%> le-mish-pa-Ti; to my judgment אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai my God וַֽאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> va-do-Nai and my Lord לְרִיבִֽי׃ <S%H7379><s%> le-ri-Vi. [even] unto my cause

שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי <S%H8199><s%> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge כְ֭צִדְקְךָ <S%H6664><s%> Che-tzid-ke-cha according to thy righteousness יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, my God וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-chu- and let them not rejoice לִֽי׃ Li.

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru Let them not say בְ֭לִבָּם <S%H3820><s%> Ve-lib-bom in their hearts הֶאָ֣ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach Ah נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu; so would we have it אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru, let them not say בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> Bil-la-'a-Nu-hu. We have swallowed him up

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ׀ <S%H2659><s%> ve-yach-pe-Ru and brought to confusion יַחְדָּו֮ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together שְׂמֵחֵ֪י <S%H8056><s%> se-me-Chei that rejoice רָעָ֫תִ֥י <S%H7451><s%> ra-'A-Ti at mine hurt יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H3847><s%> yil-be-shu- let them be clothed בֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> Vo-shet with shame וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <S%H3639><s%> u-che-lim-Mah; and dishonour הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים <S%H1431><s%> ham-mag-di-Lim that magnify עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. over

יָרֹ֣נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> ya-Ron-nu Let them shout for joy וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ <S%H8055><s%> ve-yis-me-Chu and be glad חֲפֵצֵ֪י <S%H2655><s%> cha-fe-Tzei that favour צִ֫דְקִ֥י <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ki my righteous cause וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-me-Ru yea let them say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> Ta-mid continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> yig-Dal be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; Let the LORD הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ <S%H2655><s%> he-cha-Fetz, which hath pleasure שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> she-Lom in the prosperity עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do. of his servant

וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <S%H3956><s%> U-le-sho-ni And my tongue תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> teh-Geh shall speak צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ke-cha; of thy righteousness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֝יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Hai-yom all the day תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-Te-cha. [and] of thy praise
